name: Camo – Custom Overlays
description:
Putting together an awesome looking overlay for Camo is simple. These are our recommendations for getting started.


  1. Choose overlay dimensions that match your resolution in Camo. For 1080p, that’ll be an image 1920px wide by 1080px tall.
  2. Use an appropriate scale. Details in the overlay might need to be larger than expected to be properly visible in a Zoom gallery.
  3. Export your overlays to PNG. This format support transparency, so your video can show through when the overlay is enabled.


Of course, you can use any tool you are familiar with to create overlays for Camo. While the dimensions are correct, and a PNG is made in the process, it will work perfectly.


Users are using apps like:

  • Keynote
  • Photoshop/Affinity Designer
  • Microsoft Paint
